mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`real_name` as 'realName', a.`user_name` as 'userName', a.`password` as 'password', a.`salt` as 'salt', a.`phone` as 'phone', a.`email` as 'email', a.`locked` as 'locked', a.`description` as 'description', a.`last_login_time` as 'lastLoginTime', a.`last_login_ip` as 'lastLoginIp', a.`login_count` as 'loginCount', a.`is_customer` as 'isCustomer', a.`company_code` as 'companyCode', a.`create_time` as 'createTime', a.`update_time` as 'updateTime', a.`create_admin` as 'createAdmin', a.`update_admin` as 'updateAdmin', a.`region_code` as 'regionCode',
from `t_security_admin` as a
